question: Which country was topped in ISSF Shooting World Cup 2018, Mexico?
explanation: International Shooting Sport Federation (ISSF) World Cup was held in Guadalajara, Mexico from 1st to 12th March, 2018. India topped the medal tally at ISSF Shooting World Cup by winning four gold, one silver and three bronze. hahzar Rizvi, Manu Bhaker, Akhil Sheoran and Om Prakash Mitharval won the gold medals for India. This is the first time that India has topped medal tally in ISSF competition.
